attributes.action: The Legalisaiton of Cannabis as a short term cure for ME
attributes.additional_details:
Cannabis should be legalised because it can help sufferers of M.E. and other painful diseases ease their pain.

This is because some people don't like the side-effects of drugs such as painkillers on their bodies.

Although it is claimed that it causes schizophrenia in some users, it is still a powerful painkiller that, if used in the right doses, can help people. :)
